name: Real Shoot Terrorist
description:
It is very addictive with thrilling action, smooth controls and powerful fighting. This game gives you the opportunity to become the best professional shooter with guns. The ultimate army commando shooting games gives an exciting experience and thrilling action of being the pro counter shooter. In this game you have to be very sharp and fast to kill your enemies because they are very dangerous.

Features
- Variety of modern weapons & guns
- Challenging 3D First Person Shooting (FPS) gameplay
- Thrilling & exciting missions
- Immersive 3D environment
- Play this 3D game simply and easily
- Complete action sniper game
- Really enjoyable for FPS war fighters
- Realistic sniper shooting adventure
- EASY and INTUITIVE controls
